div.p: Published As Name is a field in the Bibliography Database which records names other than the Standard Name under which a BWW published. This field records the use on title-pages of pseudonymous, allusive, or variant names: any form other than the standard.
Enter pseudonyms, used, and allusive names in the order in which they should read in the final citation.

Pseudonyms should be entered as Bob Short or A Dissenter, not Short, Bob or Dissenter, A. Allusive Author Names should be entered as The Author of David Simple. Used Names should be entered as Mrs Humphry Ward, not Ward, Mrs Humphry. Enter Anonymous when appropriate, including instances of publishing as A Lady.
